name: Bit Vortex
description:
Made for the "Mini Jam 125: Signal" game jam.

You are a bit and the other bits don't like you.
With your glitchy signal scanner, which seems to
keep speeding up in frequency - you can detect
and destroy the other bits, but your main mission
is just to survive.

Levels 1 to 100.
Bullet hell (sort of - they're your bullets).

WASD for movement
MOUSE1 + MOUSE2 for attack

DEVELOPMENT & PROGRAMMING:
@zerog3n (github/itch.io)

GFX / AUDIO / ASSETS:
Graphic design and effects - @zerog3n
Sounds and audio from Pixabay
Music by LiteSaturation from Pixabay
- https://pixabay.com/users/litesaturation-17654080
